Todo List

Member enveffect::EnvEffect.loc
: fix this.

Member map::Map.blocks
These should be enumerated somewhere and the enums used instead of bare integers.

Member map::Map.loadMap
This parser is very brittle, and while the map file format is not meant to be directly user-editable, there's no reason we couldn't be more flexible here.

Member map::Map.writeMap
: Add support for enviroments to the map file.

Member physicsobject::PhysicsObject.handleCollisions
Currently assumes all collisions are with terrain.

Member player::Player.__init__
(Long-term) Add support for the female version

Class polygon.Polygon
: enforce convex constraint (currently you can make concave polygons; they'll just have buggy collision detection).

Member prop::Prop.surface
: convert these to sprites so that props can be animated.

Member quadtree::QuadTree.addObject
: calling rebalanceTree every time we add an object is needlessly inefficient.

Member soundmanager::SoundManager.__init__
: Make this configurable.

Member sprite::Sprite.getCurrentAnimation
Assumes that the facing is the last two characters of the string. Probably a better way to handle this.

Member sprite::Sprite.setAnimation
shouldResetAnimation should be handled better. Currently we need it so we can "try out" different polygons for collision detection (c.f. TerrestrialObject crawl logic) without interfering with smooth animation.

Class terrestrialobject.TerrestrialObject
The logic dealing with crawling (and, in particular, forcing crawls when there's no headroom) is rather convoluted and should be improved.

Class mapgen.environments.water.Water
Make water pools affect physics.

Drawing water pools is currently prohibitively slow. Fix this.

Member constants.fontNames
Make this more modular (move it out to a font config module)
